name: mySocial Interactive Story
description:
Ashley, Angie, Dorothy, Keith and Jun are all ready to begin freshman year of high school with you. What character do you want to experience high school through? Ashley, the confident cheerleader, Angie, the gossip girl, Dorothy, the nervous outcast, Keith, the star quarterback or Jun, the asian immigrant.

All stories start at the same point: Home Room in Ms. Hawkins class. From there the character's journey in high school will begin and it's up to you with the choices they make.

Read both their intimate thoughts in their diary and their public posts on mySocial.

Go to our Facebook page and tell us who your favorite character is and why?
